Vacant Council Position

Vacant Council Position
=======================

***City of Palouse Council Seat #7 Vacancy***

The City of Palouse is accepting letters of interest to fill the vacant council position #7 to serve until Dec. 31, 2027. This is a council-appointed position and is open until it is filled. The City Council meets on the second and fourth Tuesday of every month at 7:00 PM. To be eligible, you must reside within the city limits of Palouse & be a registered voter in the city (RCW 35.23.031).

If interested, please submit this
[application](https://www.palousewa.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/Council-Appointment-App-01.27.26.pdf)
no later than 5:00 PM on January 23, 2026, via email to
[cityadmin@palousewa.gov](mailto:cityadmin@palousewa.gov)
or in person at Palouse City Hall, 120 E. Main Street, Palouse, WA  99161. Interviews will be held during the January 27, 2026, City Council Meeting, and all applicants are expected to attend.

### Palouse City Hall

East 120 Main Street
P.O Box 248
Palouse, WA 99161

**City Hall Hours:**
Monday through Friday,
9:00 am to 4:00 pm
